text: Antony Cotton (born Antony Dunn; 5 August 1975) is an English actor. He is best known for playing Sean Tully in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street from 2003 onwards. He also played the role of Alexander Perry in the original UK version of Queer as Folk. He was born in Bury, Greater Manchester, England. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:English LGBT people Category:Gay men Category:LGBT actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Greater Manchester
title: Antony Cotton
